pageProduct.name: Amazonia Raw Beauty Collagen Glow Unflavoured 350g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Amazonia Raw Collagen Glow is a premium, beauty formula designed to support collagen production, natural connective tissue structure and skin function. Collagen makes up 75% of our skin and degenerates from our mid 20s onwards. This beauty blend contains 5000mg of Type I & III Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides in a highly bioavailable form with Vitamin C to promote natural collagen formation. Amazonia Raw Collagen Glow is the ultimate beauty powder for glowing skin.

Warnings

Contains fish products.

Common Uses

Shakes, smoothies, breakfast bowls

Ingredients

Collagen Beauty Blend (Marine Collagen, Wildcrafted Sea Buckthorn Juice), Organic Tapioca Maltodextrin*, Organic Jerusalem Artichoke Inulin* [prebiotic]. *Certified Organic.

Directions

Mix 9g (1 heaped tablespoon) into 300ml of cold water, coconut water or liquid of choice. For optimal results consume 1 serve daily. Also delicious combined into your favourite smoothies, breakfast bowls and recipes.
